Bit(){const{user:a}=es(),[t,e]=K.useState([]),[n,i]=K.useState([]),[s,o]=K.useState(!1),[r,c]=K.useState(!1),[l,A]=K.useState({title:"",description:"",category:"Otros",file_url:"",file_size:0,file_type:""}),[u,h]=K.useState(null);K.useEffect(()=>{v(),f()},[]);async function f(){const{data:S,error:R}=await It.from("document_categories").select("*").order("name");R?(yt.error("Error al cargar categoras"),i([{id:"1",name:"Nminas",description:""},{id:"2",name:"Contratos",description:""},{id:"3",name:"Polticas",description:""},{id:"4",name:"Procedimientos",description:""},{id:"5",name:"Otros",description:""}])):S&&i(S)}async function v(){const{data:S,error:R}=await It.from("documents").select(`
897-        *,
898-        uploader:profiles(full_name)
899:      `).order("created_at",{ascending:!1});R?yt.error("Error al cargar documentos"):S&&e(S)}async function g(){if(u){c(!0);try{const{data:{session:S}}=await It.auth.getSession(),R=S==null?void 0:S.access_token;if(!R){yt.error("No autenticado"),c(!1);return}const M=new FormData;M.append("file",u);const I=await(await fetch("https://zaxdscclkeytakcowgww.supabase.co/functions/v1/upload-document",{method:"POST",headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${R}`},body:M})).json();I.success?(A(j=>({...j,file_url:I.url,file_size:I.fileSize,file_type:I.fileType})),yt.success("Archivo subido correctamente"),h(null)):yt.error(I.error||"Error al subir archivo")}catch{yt.error("Error al subir archivo")}finally{c(!1)}}}async function w(S){if(S.preventDefault(),!l.file_url){yt.error("Debes subir un archivo primero");return}if(!a){yt.error("No
